title: Sell a Gift Card
description: A customer wants to purchase a $50 gift card.

tasks.description: Select the 'Sell Gift Card' option on the POS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The POS enters the gift card sales workflow.

tasks.description: Scan the gift card's barcode and enter the amount ($50) to be loaded onto it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The gift card is identified, and the value is entered.

tasks.description: Take payment from the customer and complete the transaction, which activates the gift card.
tasks.expected_outcome: The gift card is successfully activated with the correct value.
